turns.label: sv

growing up with - when I grew up it just was not we did not have any causes

But it - see men are coming into their own --

You know But that that is the way most people feel that women should get custody

turns.text: Oh Well see that that is the spirit of the sixties And whether we are talking about the rain forests -
